title: How well are electric vehicles doing in the European market?
subtitle: In 2024, 13.6% of all newly registered passenger cars were battery electric. This indicates a decline in market share, down from 14.5% in 2023.
textNote: For this analysis, all major passenger-car propulsion systems were considered. These include petrol and diesel engines, plug-in hybrid petrol-electric and diesel-electric systems, other hybrid configurations, battery-electric vehicles, and hydrogen or fuel-cell vehicles.
